title: Park Communities

midweek.heading: Midweek Communities
paragraphs: Park Communities are smaller groups that meet during the week to help us grow as disciples of Jesus in everyday life.
Most groups meet weekly to read God's Word, pray, and encourage one another in faith.

images.alt: Church and community gathering in the grounds

rhythm.heading: Our Rhythm
items: Up: Seeking God in prayer and Scripture.

image.alt: Community singing together outside church at Christmas

cta_html: Ready to join a community? Contact us and we will help find the right group.
